channel.title: Where are they now?
channel.description: 1. Hey guys, it's acristoff (I forgot my old email so I couldn't register a new device) I don't know if any of you remember me but I wanted to catch up with the old crew here and know what you're all up to these days. Life has changed a lot for me since then and I found the feeling to return here after stumbling on my old forum posts.[/size]

item.title: Where are they now?
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
intooblivion:

I guess I sort of just came back. Still deciding on if its worth it.

awe shiiit welcome back

Read full topic

item.title: Where are they now?
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Who knew I’d spend almost 4 times a week since sophomore year checking back here? Welcome back

Read full topic

item.title: Where are they now?
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
Yep, I still come in here every day or two.

I’ve been following this mod for so long that this forum has just become part of my life.

Of course, I’m not a high school freshman anymore like I was when I started here. Now I’m a systems engineer who just turned 27 last week.

Read full topic

item.title: Where are they now?
item.dc:creator: acristoff2
item.description:
(rot)(fodder:

Well congrats! If you are in Vancouver I’m about 6 hours east of you, I don’t suppose you get out to the okanagan much?

I plan on it once I have a car and all that. For now I’m pretty much locked into the vancouver area in terms of transportation.

Read full topic

item.title: Where are they now?
item.dc:creator: acristoff2
item.description:
(rot)(fodder:

Somehow missed this thread, good to see you again here, I’ve stopped into chat every once and a while but it is always dead as a dead thing. How have you been?

Geekofalltrades and Danielsangeo are still kicking around here somewhere, and every once in a year Raw_Bean will come flying in for a one post drive by.

I’ve been good. Working as a painter and running my own tech business on the side these days. I ended up meeting a girl online in an autistic mandarin woodcarving forum and we hit it off, I’m now engaged and living with her in Vancouver.

What have you all been up to?[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Where are they now?
item.dc:creator: Hubicorn
item.description:
acristoff2:
  1. Hey guys, it’s acristoff (I forgot my old email so I couldn’t register a new device) I don’t know if any of you remember me but I wanted to catch up with the old crew here and know what you’re all up to these days. Life has changed a lot for me since then and I found the feeling to return here after stumbling on my old forum posts.[/size]
  1. Welcome Back!
  2. It’s nice to see you!
  3. The crew is still lurking around, a lot of new faces around here.
  4. If you want, PM me and we can get your old account back
  5. look, its a numbered list!
  6. and it needed to be even, not odd

Read full topic
